roleset.name: cause to not be level
roleset.note: TIP-V NOTES: Member of Vncls throw-17.1-1-1. The FN class is for Tip_hand, which apparently is included in this class. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from tip.01-v)
TIP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on tip-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls throw-17.1-1-1. (from tip.01-n)

example.name: semi-idiomatic
example.text: During that time, a buyer with the clout of a Renaissance could end up driving up the price of stocks it was trying to buy if it tipped its hand.

example.name: with end state
example.text: Frank Lloyd Wright is reported to have said once that if you tipped the world on its side, everything loose would end up in California.

example.name: arg1 and GOL
example.text: He ended each day with a tip of his hat to the hotel's front-desk staff.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: Remember, this is not a civil action, which would simply be a tip of the scales to either side.

roleset.name: leave a gratuity
roleset.note: TIP-V NOTES: Member of Vncls bill-54.5. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from tip.02-v)
TIP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on tip-v.02. Corresponds to Vncls bill-54.5. (from tip.02-n)

example.name: all args
example.text: John tipped the waiter a measly 2%.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: A tip of $20 to $50 for the crew may be in order, based on the complexity of the task.

example.name: with args 0 and2
example.text: And for $1000 fine?that's just his tip to the waiter.

roleset.name: inform, give advice, the giving of advice or information
roleset.note: TIP-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from tip.05-v)
TIP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on corpus examples, modified by Kevin. No corresponding VNcls. (from tip.03-n)

example.name: like tipped off without the particle
example.text: Waksal-1 admitted to *PRO*-1 tipping his daughter *PRO* to dump ImClone stock just ahead of a drug rejection.
example.arg: just ahead of a drug rejection

example.name: just arg2
example.text: That Cook uh admits that she frequently winked at Jackson 's mother um Katherine in court and exchanged wardrobe tips with the entertainer 's mom...

example.name: just arg1
example.text: You know so it 's w- was a tip to the police /.

example.name: just arg2- as SBar link
example.text: Officials got a tip *ICH*-1 back then [that someone may have dumped equipment into one of the park 's ponds]-1 .

example.name: all args
example.text: Wallace's tips to police that they "would be smart" to look in the garbage outside Pinky Burnes' residence and that they could "set up" Kyles and find the murder weapon inside the apartment suggest that Wallace was in control of critical evidence.
example.arg: that they "would be smart" to look in the garbage outside Pinky Burnes' residence and that they could "set up" Kyles and find the murder weapon inside the apartment

roleset.name: top with
roleset.note: TIP-V NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No VN or FN class. Framed by Katie (from tip.06-v)

example.name: 2 of 3 args
example.text: a suicide vest tipped with nails

example.name: messy boy
example.text: John deliberately tipped over Mary's full coffee cup.

example.name: transitive
example.text: Filling out detailed forms about these individuals would tip the IRS off and spark action against the clients, he said.
example.arg: Filling out detailed forms about these individuals
